channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Case of the Camera Exposure
item.author: A Dixon Hawke Mystery
item.description: "Talking of tall stories," he said presently, "would you like to hear a perfectly true one for a change? It has a bearing on that antagonism—which we've just seen instanced—that exists between the artistic and the business mind."
